description.p: A set of clothes which belonged to a young hero with an unexplainable ability to never die. These clothes have absorbed some of this incredible power, gaining a similar ability.

Survival If you take an instance of damage that would reduce you to 0 hitpoints while wearing this item, and the amount of damage is less than your maximum hitpoints, you take no damage instead. Once this ability is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
